adviseScripts.text: As a police officer, I see a lot of drunks on the streets.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Some of them even threaten us, asking why lowly police dare to arrest them. Grr...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: What should I do when I run into this kind of person?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Show them who's boss.
Let it slide. The police are only here to protect and serve.
Good idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: The iron fist of the law must keep a tight grip!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: It's like you read my mind or something!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Uh... I didn't know you were going to give such an earnest answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I guess I have no choice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Fine. I'll be more patient with them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Poli talk about the challenges of being a police officer.
Ugh, Miranda's over-enthusiasm got the better of her again today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: She ended up botching an investigation!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: What can I do to make her stop doing that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Strict punishment.
It's better to just give up.
I've done that so many times already. Grr...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: And yet, she never stops making a mess.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Ugh. Is that the only way?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I guess I will just have to give up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: But I'm glad someone else thinks the same way, anyway.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I comfort Poli about Miranda's bad habits.
Commander, have you heard of sweet potato-flavored Splendamin?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: It's been getting pretty popular recently.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, I like it.
Are you sure it's not just popular with you?
Ha! I knew you'd get it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: The greatness of sweet potato flavor!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I can hardly live without it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Hmm, Miranda said if I eat too much, I will get fat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Seems that it's too hard for a child like her to realize its greatness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Commander! You, too?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: How could it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I praise the greatness of sweet potato-flavored Splendamin with Poli.
You know, I was just thinking about this the other day...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: If I didn't become a police officer, what do you think I would have been?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I think you'd make a great lapdog.
Nothing suits you like being a police officer.
D-dog!?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I asked you a serious question and you're treating it like a joke?! Grrr...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Arf! You've gone too far!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Hmmm... Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: There's no career for me except the police...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: That sounds pretty nice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Poli about careers.
I like warm days best.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: They make me feel so relaxed and sleepy...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I just wanna lie down on the ground.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Well, you're already pretty close to the ground.
Do you want me to pet you?
You are so mean.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Just because I'm short doesn't mean I'm always lying on the ground, you know! Grrr...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: How did you know I wanted to be pet?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Commander, your instincts are as sharp as mine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I enjoy the warm weather with Poli.
Ugh... Commander, this rainy weather makes me feel like a sloth.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: My body's so drained. I'm turning into a literal couch potato.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Do you want me to pet you?
It's because you have dog fur.
Uh, I have no idea why you just said that, but since you did...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I do like being stroked. I'll take it, with pleasure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: D-dog fur!?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I know my hair is extremely fluffy and voluptuous,
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: but you don't get to call it dog fur!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Poli about rainy weather.
A few days ago, a kid said I look like a marshmallow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: The nerve of that brat! Argh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Grr... I'm furious. Why in the world would he say that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Because of your fluffy hair?
Because of your chipmunk cheeks?
Hmm... Okay, fair enough.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I guess my hair is really the problem here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Hmmm... But it's part of who I am.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I'm not gonna change it just cuz of some nosy kids.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Ch-cheeks?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I-I didn't expect that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: ... Fine! I've decided. I'm going to go on a diet, starting today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Then no one will ever say I look like a marshmallow again!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for the tip, Commander!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Poli, who really does look like a marshmallow.
Commander, tell me the truth.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Are you a dog person or a cat person?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Of course, a dog person.
Definitely a cat person.
Haha, I knew it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Your smell told me everything!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: C-cat person? Grrr...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Wh-why...?! Usually, you can't keep your eyes off of my fluffy hair!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I can't accept this! Arrgghh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I have a serious discussion with Poli about the loveliness of puppies.
Commander, I'm in a really bad mood right now!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: How can I calm down?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Come here. Let me pet you.
Just get rid of whatever's bothering you.
Sounds like a plan!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Looks like I really asked the right person!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: But the person I'm angry at is myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: It'd be pretty impractical to get rid of myself...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Ugh.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I try to calm Poli down.
Commander. Listen carefully.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I ate some pudding and put the leftovers in the fridge.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: But, Miranda got hungry and ate it all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Miranda told me she didn't know the pudding was mine, and that she was about to starve to death.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Should I believe her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: It sounds like the cowardly excuse of a criminal.
Wouldn't it be better to trust her word?
That's right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: It's time to drop the hammer of justice on that criminal! Grr...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Wooo... trust her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Do I really have to?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I try to console Poli's anger against Miranda.
I was watching a crime thriller with Miranda today
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: and she had no idea who the criminal was.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: It was so obvious who they were too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: You're a veteran police officer, so spotting criminals is practically second nature for you.
You... didn't by any chance know who the criminal was before you watched the movie, did you?
You really think that, Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: That makes me feel good!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: That's probably why I was able to figure out who the criminal was!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: What do you mean?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I would never resort to such a dirty trick!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I have pride in my policing skills.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Poli and I talk more about the criminal in the movie that she watched.
I've been thinking about changing my hairstyle.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: What kind of style should I change it to?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I think what you've got going on now suits you perfectly.
A cute pixie cut.
Agreed. Even though I want to change it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: no other hairstyle really tickles my fancy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I guess I'll just keep it like it is then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: A pixie cut?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Doing that would only
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: make my hair more curly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Just thinking about it gives me goosebumps...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Poli and I talk more in an effort to figure out a hairstyle she'll like.
Commander, do you prefer spending time alone,
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: or going out with a group of people?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I enjoy being around you.
I enjoy going out with a big group.
Where did that come from?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: However, it's not a bad answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I enjoy spending time with you as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: A big group, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I tend to have more fun in smaller groups.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Poli and I talk more about how we prefer hanging out with others.
Commander, if I was a toy,
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: what type of toy do you think I would be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: An adorable stuffed puppy.
A bad-to-the-bone police figurine.
A puppy?! Grrr...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I'd pick badass over cute any day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Nice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I'd rather be a badass than cute.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for letting me know what you think.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Who knows, if I keep making my mark, store shelves may be flooded with Poli figurines one day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Poli and I pondered how to make Poli figurines.
Commander, is there any other career you'd like to try out other than what you're doing now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to give being a police officer a shot, like you.
I'd want to be a dog sitter.
It's good you want to be a police officer, but if you want to get to my level,
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: it won't be easy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: However, if I have you under my supervision,
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I may have more fun on the job!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: A dog sitter?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Now there's an answer I didn't expect.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Hey, you're not poking fun at me, are you? Grrrr...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Poli and I had fun imagining all sorts of careers we'd like to try out.
*Grrrr*
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Is there a dog nearby?
What's going on?
What?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I was already in a bad mood, and you're only making it worse!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: *Grrrr*
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Let me tell you, I am seriously peeved!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Some wino tried to pick a fight with me today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: He kept making fun of my bark... Grrrrrr
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I do my best to calm down Poli.
Today, I don't want to do anything. I just want to kick back and relax.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I have so much to do though...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Forget all that, let's hang out.
Let's hang out after you're done.
Right now? Where? Do you think we should...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, sure! Work hard, play hard, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Let's go to the park.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I suppose you're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: But I can't seem to concentrate.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Do you want to hang out when I'm done with work?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I have a fun time hanging out with Poli.
Drats, just look at this! I scraped my knee again today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I had a good streak of no injuries going too... at least I didn't take too hard a spill.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Change the bandage.
You should be more careful.
Huh? Oh, you don't have to... thanks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure that'll help it heal more quickly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I could say the same thing to you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I was being careful! And I still got injured!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I talk to Poli as I look more closely at her wound.
When I was on patrol today, this little girl said,
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Poli! Curly! Cool!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: What do you think she meant?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Your hair is cool because it's so curly.
She thinks that you're cool.
So she liked my hair?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... I guess it is kinda cool.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Me? Cool?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Well, I guess it's always nice to hear a compliment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Poli and I have a nice chat.
I want to be on the force until the day I die.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Think I can do it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: In your case Poli, I think it's possible.
There's no such thing as lifelong careers anymore.
Woof, woof! That's awesome to hear you say that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I'll protect you until the very end.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Fair enough, good point... but you don't have to be such a party pooper...
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: I still want to do this job for life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Poli

adviseScripts.text: Poli and I have a conversation about career aspirations.
